content: If any man come to me, and hate not his father, and mother, and wife, and children, and brethren, and sisters, yea, and his own life also, he cannot be my disciple.
translations: ita:Se alcuno viene a me, e non odia suo padre, e sua madre, e la moglie, e i figliuoli, e i fratelli, e le sorelle, anzi an
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Scott (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
